name: Cat Rescue - Draw to Save
description:
🐱 Draw games help you train your brain effectively, download cat Rescue to save your kitty from bees, and relax your mind now!

Is it challenging to draw a line and save your little cat from bees?

You must use your freehand drawing skills to save a cat from a swarm of bees in the entertaining and addicting brainteaser game cat Rescue.

🐼 Your silly cat is curiously walking toward the hive. Before it's too late, let's rescue the cat! This is the addictive game for you! You can play this game to train your brain, moreover, save the kitty is one of the most interesting draw games that help you to challenge your mind. Play now!

🐷 Your cat is being attacked by a sizable swarm of bees, and you can assist defend it by touching the screen and drawing a line of any shape. Not only can you save your cat, but also you can save other animals when changing many types of memes like panda, cat, frog... Share with your friends and play rescue the cat bee together!

🐶 Within 5 seconds of pulling your finger off the screen, if your cat has not perished in an accident or been stung by a bee, you will have completed the level and moved on to the next one.

Why should you play the cat Rescue game?

🐝 Relax your mind

🐝 Draw game that boosts your creativity

🐝 Enhance creativity and imagination

🐝 Test your IQ easily

🐝 Challenge your ability on many levels

🐝 Interesting memes

📌 How the cat was saved from the bees?

1. Draw 2 save:

To win the game, draw a line to save your little cat from the bees. You can draw any shape as long as you can protect the cat from the bees.

2. Please complete your drawing during the next five seconds.

3. You can go on to the following level after saving the cat. If failing, please try to draw again to rescue the cat from bees.

❓ How smart are you? Save your little cat from bees now. Try to win this entertaining & simple game to sharpen your brain! If you have any questions or comments, please contact us at squarerix@gmail.com, we always appreciate all your comments. Thank you!
